Dear HAGOP,

Welcome to the Cigna family. Your health insurance plan is administered by Neuron, a strategic partner of Cigna. 

Enclosed in this email are important details and documents in relation to your health insurance plan. Please review your personal information below and reach out to us on 800-SMARTCARE in case of any inaccuracies.

chunks.text:
Enclosed in this email are important details and documents in relation to your health insurance plan. Please review your personal information below and reach out to us on 800-SMARTCARE in case of any inaccuracies. 

PERSONAL DETAILS	 	
First Name: HAGOP	 
Last Name: GHAZARIAN	 
Policy Holder: M.C.T. FZE	 
Neuron ID: 52SC40898040975	 
LVL Code: Refer to LVL Flyer	 
In line with our digital proposition, a digital copy of your membership card is attached in this email. To safeguard your information, a unique 8-digit password is required to open the attached documents. For your convenience, we have set your date of birth as this password in the "DDMMYYYY" format. Do not include any space or special characters, while inserting your password. This will allow you cardless access to care at all providers within your network. The digital ID card is also available through the SmartCare by Cigna app 

Alternatively, you can also use your Emirates ID, registered with Cigna. 

Other attachments on this email consist of: 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/SC-Helpful-Guide-Cover.jpg> 	1. 

Helpful Guide 
The purpose of this document is to present an easy-to-understand reference guide to valuable information on the benefits, exclusions, different Co-insurance calculations and Claims procedures within your policy. 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/SC Member Booklet-Cover.jpg> 	2.

chunks.text:
Helpful Guide 
The purpose of this document is to present an easy-to-understand reference guide to valuable information on the benefits, exclusions, different Co-insurance calculations and Claims procedures within your policy. 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/SC Member Booklet-Cover.jpg> 	2. 

Member Booklets 
This document explains in detail the health insurance plan selected by your company and the associated benefits available to you. You can also refer to the Table of Benefits on the SmartCare by Cigna app. 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/telehealth.jpg> 	3. 

Telehealth Services through TruDoc 
This document highlights the process for you to register for our Telehealth services, which will allow you access to services such as, but not limited to:


*	Get virtual round-the-clock access to General Physician and wellness experts.
*	Call or schedule an appointment with a doctor no matter where you are in the world.
*	Have medication delivered to you at home (service currently only available in Dubai).


 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/truedoc.jpg> 



 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/eap.jpg> 	4.

chunks.text:
*	Get virtual round-the-clock access to General Physician and wellness experts.
*	Call or schedule an appointment with a doctor no matter where you are in the world.
*	Have medication delivered to you at home (service currently only available in Dubai).


 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/truedoc.jpg> 



 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/eap.jpg> 	4. 

Employee Assistance Programme (EAP) * 
As part of your SmartCare plan, you and your family are eligible for 24/7/365 access to free confidential assistance with any work, personal or family issue. For details and instructions on how to access this service please refer to the attached Smart Care EAP flyer.
* Optional benefit - based on selection by employer, please refer to your Table of Benefits for details. 


	
 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/csp.jpg> 	5. 

Cigna Select Providers 
Access to 45+ Cigna Select Providers** that offer high quality and cost effective care along with privilege services designed to make your hospital experience easier and more efficient.
** Participating providers and privileges are subject to change and may vary based on the provider. 


	
 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/lvl-banner.jpg> 	6. 

LVL Wellbeing Services 
LVL is an online streaming platform that offers employees a constantly curated selection of more than 500 sessions from the world's best coaches, trainers, and experts. Access the platform anytime, anywhere on any device, at no additional cost.

LVL Wellbeing Services 
LVL is an online streaming platform that offers employees a constantly curated selection of more than 500 sessions from the world's best coaches, trainers, and experts. Access the platform anytime, anywhere on any device, at no additional cost.



 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/lvl-logo.jpg> 	
 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/shape-1.jpg> 	 	 
	
	
	SmartCare by Cigna Mobile App and Cigna-Neuron Member Portal

To start your journey with SmartCare by Cigna, please download the Smart Care by Cigna app on your mobile. This app will serve as your centralised "hub", a single destination from where you can find providers, view applicable Co-insurances, access wellness information, check your Claim status and so much more. 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/qrcode.png> 	To register, all you need to do is scan the QR code for easy registration or follow these simple steps. 	
 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/appsec.jpg> 	
 
 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/mobapp-11.png> 

Step 1:

Download the SmartCare by Cigna App from the Apple ® App Store or Google ® Play Store 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/mobapp-12.png> 

Step 2:

Open the App on your phone and click on "Sign Up" 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/mobapp-13.png> 

Step 3:

Fill in all the details. Select method of registration, either your Neuron ID or your Emirates ID number and click "Sign Up" 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/mobapp-14.png> 

Step 4:

chunks.text:
Fill in all the details. Select method of registration, either your Neuron ID or your Emirates ID number and click "Sign Up" 

 <https://nasntouchtest.nas.ae/NNTFiles/smartcare/mobapp-14.png> 

Step 4:

Once registration is successful, an activation code will be sent to you by email, enter the code to activate your account 

In case you face any problems during registration, or have any questions about your plan, you can email us on smartcare.support@neuron.ae <mailto:smartcare.support@neuron.ae>  or call us on 800-SMARTCARE. 

At Cigna, we make it our mission to improve your health, well-being and peace of mind. No matter where you are in the world, we're with you, all the way. 



	Regards,

Cigna Insurance Middle East
